    Tools to support DE analysis

    DE_Support_Tools.Rd

    Tools to support DE analysis

    level_matcher(raw_levels = NULL, ordered_levels = NULL)

UpdateLevelsbyList(metadata = NULL, named_levels = NULL)

valid_factors(metadata = NULL)

    Arguments

    raw_levels

    string of factor levels in data to be sorted.

    ordered_levels

    string of factor levels in the desired order

    metadata

    A data.frame containing factors

    named_levels

    a named list containing the levels to set as reference via fct_relevel

    Value

    data.frame with factors

    Details

    level_matcher() returns overlapping strings between raw_levels and ordered_levels, with the ordering of the later. No partial string matching. This is useful when applying a generic factor level order to different metadata that do not share all the same levels.

    The names from named_levels map to the columns in metadata to update. List slots contain strings passed to the ... argument of fct_relevel

    This is all done with imap_dfc

    drops single level factors with metadata select_if(~n_distinct(na.omit(.x))>1)

    Contents
